scripts.appinstall: gulp app-install && gulp rw-settingseeder && php artisan component:publish-asset Onsigbaar && php artisan vendor:publish --tag=voyager_assets --force && php artisan migrate && composer dump-autoload && php artisan db:seed && php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDatabaseSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDummyDatabaseSeeder && php artisan storage:link && php artisan passport:install && gulp rw-assets && gulp
scripts.appinstall-dep: composer install && bower install && yarn && php artisan key:generate && php artisan jwt:secret && gulp app-install && gulp rw-settingseeder && php artisan component:publish-asset Onsigbaar && php artisan vendor:publish --tag=voyager_assets --force && php artisan migrate && composer dump-autoload && php artisan db:seed && php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDatabaseSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDummyDatabaseSeeder && php artisan storage:link && php artisan passport:install && gulp rw-assets && gulp
scripts.appinstall-ps: gulp app-install -and gulp rw-settingseeder -and php artisan component:publish-asset Onsigbaar -and php artisan vendor:publish --tag=voyager_assets --force -and php artisan migrate -and composer dump-autoload -and php artisan db:seed -and php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDatabaseSeeder -and php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDummyDatabaseSeeder -and php artisan storage:link -and php artisan passport:install && gulp rw-assets && gulp
scripts.appinstall-dep-ps: composer install -and bower install -and yarn -and php artisan key:generate -and php artisan jwt:secret -and gulp app-install -and gulp rw-settingseeder -and php artisan component:publish-asset Onsigbaar -and php artisan vendor:publish --tag=voyager_assets --force -and php artisan migrate -and composer dump-autoload -and php artisan db:seed -and php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDatabaseSeeder -and php artisan db:seed --class=VoyagerDummyDatabaseSeeder -and php artisan storage:link -and php artisan passport:install -and gulp rw-assets -and gulp
scripts.devsetup: php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');" && cd packages && mkdir onsigbaar && cd onsigbaar && git clone https://github.com/onsigbaar/components.git && git clone https://github.com/onsigbaar/foundation.git && cd components && composer update && cd ../ && cd foundation && composer update && cd ../../../ && cd app/Components && git clone https://github.com/consigliere/LogDB.git && git clone https://github.com/consigliere/AppFoundation.git && git clone https://github.com/consigliere/Onsigbaar.git && cd LogDB && composer update && cd ../ && cd AppFoundation && composer update && cd ../ && cd Onsigbaar && composer update && cd ../../../ && bower install && yarn && composer install && php artisan key:generate && php artisan jwt:secret && composer update && gulp
scripts.devsetup-no-update: php -r "file_exists('.env') || copy('.env.example', '.env');" && cd packages && mkdir onsigbaar && cd onsigbaar && git clone https://github.com/onsigbaar/components.git && git clone https://github.com/onsigbaar/foundation.git && cd ../../ && cd app/Components && git clone https://github.com/consigliere/LogDB.git && git clone https://github.com/consigliere/AppFoundation.git && git clone https://github.com/consigliere/Onsigbaar.git && cd ../../ && bower install && yarn && composer install && php artisan key:generate && php artisan jwt:secret && gulp
